titleStmt.title: The disposition or garnishmente of the soule to receiue worthily the blessed Sacrament deuyded into three discourses, 1 Preparation. 2 Presentation before Christ. 3 Enterteinment.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Thomas, d. 1624.

titleStmt.title: The disposition or garnishmente of the soule to receiue worthily the blessed Sacrament deuyded into three discourses, 1 Preparation. 2 Presentation before Christ. 3 Enterteinment.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Thomas, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Ioachim Trognesius [i.e. the English secret press],

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: T.N., i.e. Thomas Wright.
The imprint is false; printed by the English secret press (STC).
With additional quire y containing "A conclusion". Variant: lacking this quire.
Identified as STC 18335 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

person.persName: Ioachim Trognesius [i.e. the English secret press]
